item.title: Emmys: Reba McEntire Leads Tribute to ‘The Golden Girls’ With Performance of Iconic Theme Song
item.description: Little Big Town’s Karen Fairchild and Kimberly Schlapman joined the country singer on a re-creation of the show’s kitchen set.

item.title: Emmys: Reba McEntire Leads Tribute to ‘The Golden Girls’ With Performance of Iconic Theme Song
item.description: Little Big Town’s Karen Fairchild and Kimberly Schlapman joined the country singer on a re-creation of the show’s kitchen set.

item.title: From Catchy to Classic: 30 of the Most Memorable TV Theme Songs
item.description: From ‘Cheers’ to ‘The O.C.,’ ‘Succession’ and yes, of course, ‘Friends,’ The Hollywood Reporter rounds up the top tunes in television’s opening credits.
